title: Ray Studios brings 21st-century tech to the 6th-century art of tattoo removal, raises $3 million - Tech.eu
content: Ray Studios brings 21st-century tech to the 6th-century art of tattoo removal, raises $3 million  Tech.eu
description: With a dramatic rise in those receiving tattoos, so rises the rate of those wishing to have them removed. Now, Paris-based Ray studios is offering a tech-enabled experience around the procedure and has raised $3 million to scale globally.
